content:
CNCF Cloud Native WebAssembly Day is happening this fall on Monday Oct 24, 2022 in conjunction with Kubecon NA in Detroit, MI. The CFP is still open until Aug 8 - and we would love to get your submissions:
https://events.linuxfoundation.org/cloud-native-wasm-day-north-america/program/cfp/

Call For Proposals (CFP) | Linux Foundation Events
Overview For any questions regarding the CFP process, please email CNCFcolocatedevents@cncf.io. SUBMIT A PROPOSAL General Info + Dates to Remember The intent of this day is to provide a vendor-neutralâ€¦
Please don't hesitate to reach out with any questions, comments, or concerns

The schedule for Cloud Native Wasm Day is live:
https://events.linuxfoundation.org/cloud-native-wasm-day-north-america/program/schedule/

On behalf of the program committee, we had an incredible number of excellent talks and, unfortunately, could not select all of them. For those that want to attend - get registered today; all talks will also be streamed live, recorded, and available on youtube after the conference. Please feel free to follow up with any questions, comments, or concerns.

Schedule | Linux Foundation Events
View the KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Europe 2020 Schedule & Directory.
